content: Hoshiarpur District is a district of Punjab state in northern India. title: Top Places to visit in Gurdaspur, Punjab
content: Gurdaspur district is a district in the Majha region of the state of Punjab, India. Gurdaspur is the district headquarters. content:
Fazilka district is one of new and 22 districts in the state of Punjab in India.

Top Places to visit in Faridkot, Punjab
content: Faridkot district is one of the 22 districts in the state of Punjab, India with Faridkot city as the district headquarters. title: Top Places to visit in Firozpur, Punjab
content:
Firozpur, also known as Ferozepur, is a city on the banks of the Sutlej River in Firozpur District, Punjab, India. It was founded by Sultan Firoz Shah Tughluq (1351–88), a ruler of the Tughluq dynasty, who reigned over the Sultanate of Delhi from 1351 to 1388.

title: Top Places to visit in Bathinda, Punjab
content: Bathinda is a city and Municipal Corporation in Southern part of Punjab, India. It is one of the oldest cities in Punjab, India and the current administrative headquarters of Bathinda District. content:
Barnala is one of the districts of Indian state of Punjab. Prior to 2006 Barnala was part of Sangrur district.

Top Places to visit in Subarnapur (Sonepur), Odisha
content:
Subarnapur District, also called Sonepur District or Sonapur District is an administrative district of Odisha state in eastern India. The town of Sonepur is the district headquarters. Many loosely call the people of Sonepur region as Sonepuria.
